By  DERRICK SMITHMarch  

NIU  vs PERIOD Buffalo 

Saturday  p.m PERIOD doubleheader and Sunday  p.m PERIOD

Coachs Take

NIU

I anticipate were going to see a better ballclub than what the overall record indicates NIU head coach Ed Mathey said PERIOD They had a pretty good season last year where they moved up in the rankings. bU

Head coach Ron Torgalski could not be reached for comment PERIOD

Last Time Out

NIU

The Huskies closed out their Spring Break trip with a  win over Dallas Baptist on March  PERIOD NIU scored five runs in the first two innings and never looked back as Adam Holdenrid pitched seven innings giving up only two runs PERIOD The senior improved his record to  on the season PERIOD

BU

The Bulls won their last time out a  victory over TexasPan American on March  PERIOD Jeffrey Hains pitched seven innings striking out five PERIOD Steve Geltz closed out the game for his second save of the season PERIOD

Key Players

NIU

Danny Reed is currently on a 12game hitting streak PERIOD The senior is batting . on the season and leads the team in RBIs with  PERIOD Reeds nine doubles are tops in the MAC PERIOD

BU

Chris Ciesla is the leading hitter for the Bulls PERIOD The designated hitter is batting . with nine RBIs PERIOD

Ciesla is going to cause us some problems and weve got to figure out a way to handle him Mathey said PERIOD

Vital Stat

NIU

The Huskies hold a  series lead over the Bulls but the two teams have not met since  PERIOD In their last outing NIU defeated BU  and  in a doubleheader PERIOD

BU

BU was prepared to host its first home series of the season but due to weather concerns BU will host the games on the road PERIOD The series is moved to Olean NY which is about an hourandahalf from Buffalo PERIOD The Bulls went  at home last year as opposed to  on the road PERIOD
